Syllabus

The following syllabus is only indicative of the topics we will be covering. We may not follow this sequence. The teaching style will be illustrative and not enumerative.

Sl. No. Topic
1 A Gentle Scratch
2 The Variable Life!
3 What If?
4 For a While
5 Math to the Rescue
6 Math! Someone Rescue!
7 Welcome to this Function
8 Recursively Viscious Life
9 File a Case and a Case from a File
10 OOPS: Feel free to Objectify
